markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eerie Compression](/Feats.aspx?ID=2527) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Medium size

</column>

---

Your limbs and even your torso can collapse in on themselves, allowing you to fit through tight spaces as though you were a Small creature. You can move at full Speed while [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Eerie Compression
